item.title: Managing Development Environments with Dotfiles
item.description:
Hello readers! Today I bring you a little blog around my development environment, using dotfiles and Neovim configurations.

Let me walk you through how I’ve structured my dotfiles for managing multiple environments while keeping everything clean and maintainable - and most importantly, version controlled.
